Primary Contact: Vicki Cairns, Director, Autism Okanagan; Phone: 250.469.0014; Email: info@autismokanagan.ca
Service Details: - Works in collaborative partnerships with several organizations including:  Autism BC, Autism Community Training (ACT), The Canucks Autism Network (CAN), the Pacific Autism Family Foundation (PAFF) and Els for Autism Canada - Provides financial support to local initiatives including the Central Okanagan Special Hockey Program and the Kelowna Autism Awareness Walk - Programs and services include:  Young Ambassadors, Kelowna Wildcats Special Hockey Program, Kelowna Wild Special Hockey Program, Mom's Night Out, Fall Family Picnic at Arion Farm, and Sensitive Santa at Orchard Park Mall
